game.title: Interstellar: The Pixel Odyssey
game.summary: Embark on a sci-fi adventure as Joseph 'Cooper,' a farmer/test pilot tasked with saving humanity by exploring space, surviving hostile environments, and unraveling the mysteries of time and relativity.
game.world_setting: Set in a pixel-art 2D world inspired by the film Interstellar, players will navigate Dust Bowl Earth, a hidden NASA facility, the Endurance spacecraft, wormhole transit, ocean and icy worlds, and the edge of a black hole, facing isolation, time dilation, and cosmic entities. The tone is a mix of hope, exploration, and the unknown, with pixelated visuals enhancing the mysterious sci-fi atmosphere.

main_character.name: Joseph 'Cooper'
main_character.visual_description: A rugged, pixelated farmer/test pilot in a worn flight suit with a faded NASA emblem on his chest and a trusty old pocket watch hanging from his belt.

characters.name: Murph
characters.visual_description: Young girl in overalls with a faded NASA patch and a mysterious locket.

characters.name: Amelia Brand
characters.visual_description: Scientist in a lab coat with a holographic interface wristband.

characters.name: TARS
characters.visual_description: Rectangular robot with movable blocks for communication.

characters.name: CASE
characters.visual_description: Boxy robot with various tools and repair equipment attached.

characters.name: Professor Brand
characters.visual_description: Elderly scientist in a lab coat with a notebook full of equations.

scenes.title: The Dust Bowl Earth
scenes.setting: Dust Bowl Earth, a barren landscape plagued by dust storms and failing crops, with the remnants of NASA hidden underground.

scenes.title: Journey to the Endurance
scenes.setting: Spacecraft Endurance, a high-tech vessel embarking on a mission through the wormhole to explore distant planets, with Amelia Brand as the lead engineer and Professor Brand overseeing.

scenes.title: Ocean World Exploration
scenes.setting: Ocean world with towering waves and hidden dangers, where the team encounters time dilation effects and hostile underwater creatures.

scenes.title: Tesseract Encounter
scenes.setting: A mind-bending tesseract-inspired sequence where Cooper navigates a multidimensional space to communicate with Murph across time and space.

scenes.title: Final Showdown near Gargantua
scenes.setting: Near Gargantua, a massive black hole, where Cooper faces off against the ultimate antagonist forces of time, isolation, and cosmic events to secure humanity's future.

skills.name: Advanced Navigation
skills.effect: Ability to plot complex courses through wormholes and celestial bodies.

skills.name: EVA Proficiency
skills.effect: Skilled in extravehicular activities for spacewalks and surface exploration.

skills.name: Relativity Understanding
skills.effect: Grasp of time dilation concepts for strategic decision-making.

skills.name: Quantum Communication
skills.effect: Ability to interact with multidimensional entities for information exchange.

skills.name: Resource Management
skills.effect: Efficient use of limited supplies and energy for extended missions.

skills.name: Adaptability
skills.effect: Quick adjustment to changing environments and unforeseen challenges.

weapons.name: Plasma Blaster
weapons.description: A high-tech energy weapon that fires powerful plasma bolts, capable of disintegrating enemy targets.

weapons.name: Gravity Spear
weapons.description: A weapon that manipulates gravity fields to impale and crush foes with immense force.

weapons.name: Chrono Blade
weapons.description: A blade infused with time-manipulating technology, allowing for quick strikes and dodges.

cutscenes.title: Dust Storm Survival
cutscenes.description: Cooper and his companions face a perilous dust storm on the Dust Bowl Earth, testing their survival skills and teamwork.

dialogue.speaker: Joseph 'Cooper'
dialogue.line: Hold on tight, we need to make it to the shelter!

dialogue.speaker: Murph
dialogue.line: I can't see anything, Cooper! Where are you?

cutscenes.title: Wormhole Transit
cutscenes.description: The team aboard the Endurance spaceship navigates through the mysterious wormhole, facing gravitational anomalies and unknown dangers.

dialogue.speaker: Amelia Brand
dialogue.line: Hold on, everyone! We're entering the wormhole now.

dialogue.speaker: Professor Brand
dialogue.line: Steady as she goes, Cooper. This is where things get interesting.

cutscenes.title: Confronting the Cosmic Entity
cutscenes.description: Cooper faces a surreal and mind-bending encounter with a cosmic entity near Gargantua, testing his understanding of relativity and quantum communication.

dialogue.speaker: Cosmic Entity
dialogue.line: You have come far, Joseph 'Cooper.' But do you truly understand the nature of time?

dialogue.speaker: Joseph 'Cooper'
dialogue.line: I may not fully grasp it, but I'm willing to learn.

dialogue.speaker: TARS
dialogue.line: Be cautious, Cooper. We don't know what we're dealing with here.
